title: Teen reportedly shot in arm in West Center City
content:
A 17-year-old boy told Wilmington police he was shot Monday night in West Center City.
The teen arrived at St. Francis Emergency Room about 8:40 p.m. with a gunshot wound to his left arm, said Sgt. Andrea Janvier, a spokeswoman with the Wilmington Police Department. He told police he was in the area of 8th and N. Madison streets when he was approached by two unknown black men who demanded his belongings at gunpoint, Janvier said.
When the teen started to flee from the men, gunfire erupted and the teen was shot in the arm, he told police.
Investigating officers were unable to find a shooting scene, Janvier said.
Anyone with information should contact Detective Matthew Geiser at (302) 576-3667.
